hero.title: The largest conference dedicated to freelancers
hero.description: **Free** and **creative** spirits who take their professional destiny into their own hands. Join Freelancers' Day, the must-attend event for ambitious and visionary freelancers in the Lyon region.

about.title: Welcome to the largest conference dedicated to freelancers
about.subtitle: About the conference
about.description: Free and creative minds taking control of your professional destiny. Join Freelancer Day, the must-attend event for ambitious and visionary freelancers in the Lyon region.

talks.title: Conference Program
talks.subtitle: Find the list of planned events
talks.description: The program takes place over one day from 08:30 to 18:00, with lectures in 40-minute and 20-minute formats throughout the day.

08:30-09:00.title: Welcome
08:30-09:00.description: Pick up your badge for the day, then take some time for breakfast to chat with coffee in hand.

09:40-12:00.title: Part One
09:40-12:00.description: Opening plenary, followed by 9 conferences spread over 3 tracks.

12:00-13:30.title: Lunch
12:00-13:30.description: Enjoy a meal provided on site. Everything is included in the ticket price.

13:30-17:40.title: Part Two
13:30-17:40.description: 12 conferences are planned in the afternoon, they are also divided into 3 tracks.

17:50-18:30.title: Closure
17:50-18:30.description: Closing plenary followed by an aperitif before leaving.

speakers.title: Conference Speakers
speakers.subtitle: Speakers
speakers.description: Renowned experts in their fields will share their knowledge to help you thrive as a freelancer.

tickets.title: Choose the ticket that suits you from our offers
tickets.subtitle: Book your spot
tickets.description: We offer you three options so you can choose what best fits your budget.

ticketTypes.name: Early bird
ticketTypes.description: The **Early bird** offer provides access to a preferential rate, the number of tickets at this rate is limited to **60 seats**, first come, first served!

ticketTypes.name: Normal
ticketTypes.description: The **Normal** offer provides access to the conference, there is no limit on the number of seats for this rate.

ticketTypes.name: Support
ticketTypes.description: By choosing the **Support** offer, you join our sponsors in making this event possible by contributing to maintaining the economic balance, and **we sincerely thank you for that!**

sponsors.title: Conference Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: Thanks to our sponsors for their support
sponsors.description: Without the support of our sponsors, we could not have offered you a conference of such quality. We would like to express our special thanks to them for their support.
